trends: There have been no other sightings in Cavaillon
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a soccer game on TV, one of my family member screamed. I ran to her room and by the window we could see a sphere. Then it started to move and did a "right left right" (45 degree) movement. Then it accelerated and evaporated. I could see a plane (army) next to it but it's speed was really low. There is a military base next to the town in Mont Ventoux.
Summary: A sphere that changes direction and evaporates - army plane next to it
